isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - CAB DOOR ELECTRIC WINDOW AND DOOR LOCK SWITCH

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR ELECTRIC WINDOW AND DOOR LOCK SWITCH

svcsubproc.title: Remove Cab Door Electric Window and Door Lock Switch on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 64 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove driver side cab door electric window and door lock switch (Item 1) by inserting removal tools (Item 2) into holes at each end of cab door electric window and door lock switch. Insert removal tools at a slight angle toward switch buttons (Item 3) to ensure that the tips of removal tools are located properly on spring retaining clips (Item 4), driver side shown.

Once removal tools (Item 2) are inserted properly in the holes at each end of cab door electric window and door lock switch (Item 1). Pull removal tools, in direction of arrows, out away from switch buttons (Item 3), to release spring retaining clips (Item 4) and lift cab door electric window and door lock switch (Item 1) out of cab door trim panel (Item 5). Remove both removal tools, driver side shown.

Once cab door electric window and door lock switch (Item 1) is lifted out of cab door trim panel (Item 5), disconnect both wiring harness connectors (Item 6) from cab door electric window and door lock switch, driver side shown. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 64. Cab Door Electric Window and Door Lock Switch

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. CAB DOOR ELECTRIC WINDOW AND DOOR LOCK SWITCH

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side cab door electric window and door lock switch.
